document.full_text: britain called on monday for the release of chinese artist ai weiwei, a prominent critic of the ruling communist party who was detained by police as he was about to board a plane to hong kong.
document.title: britain urges release of detained chinese artist
lines_and_colors: britain called on monday for the release of chinese artist ai weiwei, a prominent critic of the ruling communist party who was detained by police as he was about to board a plane to hong kong.
